about_the_game:
In The Prospector, you'll step into the shoes of a miner in the town of Everrain. As you work in the mines and complete quests, you'll gain experience and level up your character. As you become more experienced, you'll unlock new mining areas and discover even rarer ores, metals, and gemstones. You'll also have access to better mining equipment, which will help you extract these resources more efficiently.



Embrace the life of a miner as you explore caves, expand your mining operations, and unearth a variety of ores and gemstones. Delve into the depths of mysterious caves, uncovering hidden treasures and rare resources along the way. Use dynamite to expand the caves, accessing even more valuable deposits. Discover different types of ores and gemstones, each with its own unique properties and uses, as you refine your mining skills. The Prospector offers an immersive mining experience, where your journey into the depths holds the promise of riches and excitement.



Crush ores, extract pure minerals, and refine them through smelting in your quest for valuable resources. Unleash your creativity by engaging in the art of smelting and blacksmithing, crafting a wide range of items, from intricate jewelry to essential components for construction or other purposes. Decide whether to sell for profit or keep for personal use, shaping your own destiny through mining, smelting, and blacksmithing.



One of the features of The Prospector is the ability to purchase your own property in the town of Everrain. You'll be able to choose from a variety of plots, and once you've purchased a property, you'll be able to create the workshop that fits your needs and style. Fill it with the equipment or machinery that you need to craft the items you desire, using your skills in mining, smelting, and blacksmithing - and don't forget to try your hand at panning for precious metals.

Stay updated and be notified when the game is released by adding it to your wishlist now!

name: The Prospector

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: TBD
  • Graphics: TBD
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: In The Prospector, you'll play as a miner in the town of Everrain, unlocking new areas and equipment as you gain experience. Explore the town, craft items like jewelry and tools, and build a life in a community as you live the life of a miner.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America, Finnish, Russian
*languages with full audio support
